actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs..

official_title: A bill to amend section 5(c) of the National Trails System Act to provide for the study of the Daniel Boone Trail to determine the feasibility and desirability of designating such trail as a national scenic trail.

summary.text: Provides for the study under the National Trails System Act of the Danial Boone Trails extending from Cumberland Gap to Boonesboro, Kentucky, to determine the feasibility and desirability of designating such trail as a national scenic trial. (Adds 16 U.S.C. and 1244(c)(15))

titles.title: A bill to amend section 5(c) of the National Trails System Act to provide for the study of the Daniel Boone Trail to determine the feasibility and desirability of designating such trail as a national scenic trail.
